The **Gillette Labs Heated Razor + 2 Blades** is designed to transform shaving from a daily chore into an enjoyable and gratifying experience. It uses a revolutionary warming bar to provide continuous heat and comfort with every stroke. Easily choose between two heat levels. It features Gillette's most advanced, thinnest, and finest blades for incredible closeness and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Gillette Labs Heated Razor + 2 Blades**
â­ Turn on the device and select your desired heat level.
â­ Gently glide the razor across your skin.
â­ Clean the razor after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Gillette Labs Heated Razor + 2 Blades**
â­ Advanced razor blades.
â­ Warming bar.
â­ Waterproof razor body.

description_en:
**Global White** Teeth Whitening Gel Pen is the perfect solution for a brilliantly white smile in just 7 days! Easy to use and delivers fast, visible results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Global White**: 
â­ Brush your teeth thoroughly before use.
â­ Twist the pen to release the gel.
â­ Apply a thin layer to the front surfaces of your teeth.
â­ Wait for 15 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Use twice daily (morning and evening).

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Global White**:
â­ Hydrogen peroxide
â­ Glycerin
â­ Natural mint flavor
â­ Purified water

**Global White** is safe and effective, but avoid using more than twice daily, and it's not suitable for sensitive teeth. Discontinue use if irritation occurs and keep out of reach of children.

**Glow & Lovely Spf 30 Vitamin C Cream 100g** is your solution for radiant, healthy-looking skin.  Harmful sun rays can damage your skin, causing dark spots and uneven skin tone. But with **Glow & Lovely Spf 30 Vitamin C Cream 100g**, you can protect your skin and achieve a smooth, even complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Glow & Lovely Spf 30 Vitamin C Cream 100g**:
â­ Apply a suitable amount to your face morning and night.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
â­ Use daily for best results.

**Grenade Carb Killa Protein Bar Oreo Flavor 60 Gm** is the world's first protein bar made with real Oreo pieces! It features a crÃ¨me layer flavored with genuine Oreo vanilla filling and a nougaty center loaded with authentic Oreo cocoa. Wrapped in Grenade's signature low-sugar milk chocolate with real Oreo pieces added on top. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Grenade Carb Killa Protein Bar Oreo Flavor 60 Gm**: 
â­ Enjoy as a healthy snack or part of a balanced diet. 
â­ Store in a cool, dry place. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Grenade Carb Killa Protein Bar Oreo Flavor 60 Gm**: 
â­ Protein Blend (Calcium Caseinate (MILK), Whey Protein Isolate (MILK)) 
â­ MILK Chocolate with Sweetener (20%) (Sweetener: Maltitol; Cocoa Butter, Whole MILK Powder, Cocoa Mass, Emulsifier: SOY Lecithin; Natural Flavouring) 
â­ Bovine Collagen Hydrolysate 
â­ Humectant: Glycerol 
â­ Sweeteners: Maltitol, Sucralose 
â­ Palm Oil, Water, Fat-Reduced Cocoa Powder (3%), WHEAT Flour, Maize Starch, Rapeseed Oil, Bulking Agent: Polydextrose; Sea Salt, WHEAT Starch, Emulsifier: SOY Lecithin; Raising Agents: Ammonium Carbonates, Sodium Carbonates

â­ Flavourings 
â­ May Contain: NUTS and MUSTARD.

description_en:
**Grenade Carb Killa Protein Bar Chocolate Chip Dough 60gm**, a delicious protein bar with a cookie dough and chocolate chip flavour! This triple-layered bar is loaded with chocolate chips, cookie dough-flavoured nougat, gooey caramel, and coated in smooth milk chocolate. With 20g of protein and only 1.9g of sugar, this is the perfect high-protein snack for those looking for a satisfying and nutritious treat.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Grenade Carb Killa Protein Bar Chocolate Chip Dough 60gm**:
â­ Enjoy as a healthy snack between meals.
â­ Perfect post-workout for energy replenishment.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Grenade Carb Killa Protein Bar Chocolate Chip Dough 60gm**:
â­ Protein Blend (Calcium Caseinate (Milk), Milk Protein (Milk), Whey Protein Isolate (Milk))
â­ Milk Chocolate (Sweetener: Maltitol, Cocoa Butter, Whole Milk Powder, Cocoa Mass, Emulsifier: Soy Lecithin, Natural Flavourings)
â­ Bovine Gelatine
â­ Sweetener: Maltitol, Sucralose
â­ Humectant: Glycerol
â­ Humectant: Polydextrose
â­ Chocolate Chips (Sweetener: Maltitol, Cocoa Mass, Emulsifier: Soy Lecithin, Fat Reduced Cocoa Powder, Natural Flavourings)
â­ Soy Protein
â­ Soy Oil
â­ Sunflower Oil
â­ Flavourings
â­ Potassium Chloride
â­ Emulsifier: Soy Lecithin

description_en:
**Head & Shoulders** Menthol Refresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo provides the ultimate solution to get rid of dandruff and worries. â­Removes up to 100% of visible dandruff* with regular use. â­Contains Piroctone Olamine, the active ingredient that fights dandruff-causing fungus. â­Controls flaking, scaling, and itching** associated with dandruff from the first use. â­Suitable for all hair types: normal, colored, and chemically treated. â­Creamy texture, refreshing scent. â­Worldâ€™s #1 anti-dandruff shampoo, dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders**: â­Use at least twice a week. â­For best results, use every time you shampoo. â­Shake well before use. â­Gently massage into your scalp and work through to the ends of your hair. â­Rinse thoroughly and repeat if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Head & Shoulders**: â­Aqua, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycol Distearate, Zinc Carbonate, Sodium Chloride, Parfum, Sodium Xylenesulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Dimethicone, Sodium Benzoate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Magnesium Carbonate Hydroxide, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, CI 42090, CI 17200.

description_en:
**Head & Shoulders Menthol Fresh Shampoo 390ml** â€“ Get rid of dandruff and worry with **Head & Shoulders Menthol Fresh Shampoo**. This anti-dandruff shampoo removes up to 100% of visible dandruff*. Its clinically proven formula contains Piroctone Olamine, the active ingredient that fights Malassezia globose, the dandruff-causing microbe. This powerful shampoo maintains the strength of **Head & Shoulders Shampoo** in fighting dandruff. It controls flaking, scaling, and itching** associated with dandruff, and its effectiveness starts from the first use. Its balanced pH makes it suitable for all hair types: normal, colored, and chemically treated. Go out into the world with confidence when you use the worldâ€™s #1 anti-dandruff shampoo***, dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders Menthol Fresh Shampoo**
â­ Use at least twice a week for best results.
â­ Use every time you shampoo for maximum dandruff control.
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Gently massage into your scalp and work through to the ends of your hair.
â­ Rinse thoroughly and repeat if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Head & Shoulders Menthol Fresh Shampoo**
â­ Piroctone Olamine
â­ Natural Menthol
â­ Other ingredients for pH balance

*Visible dandruff with regular use
**Itching associated with dandruff
***P&G calculations are based on Nielsen sales data July 2020 â€“ June 2021

**Head & Shoulders Daily Clean Shampoo 390ml** banishes dandruff and worry. This anti-dandruff shampoo removes up to 100% of visible dandruff. Its clinically proven formula contains Piroctone Olamine, the active ingredient that fights Malassezia globose, the dandruff-causing microbe. This powerful shampoo controls flaking, scaling, and itching associated with dandruff, and starts working from the first use.  Its pH balanced formula suits all hair types: normal, colored, and chemically treated hair, leaving your hair feeling fresh and confident. The worldâ€™s #1 anti-dandruff shampoo, dermatologically tested. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders Daily Clean Shampoo 390ml**: 
â­ Wet your hair. 
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Head & Shoulders** to your hair. 
â­ Gently massage your scalp. 
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Head & Shoulders Daily Clean Shampoo 390ml**: 
â­ Piroctone Olamine. 
â­ Other effective and hair-safe ingredients.

description_en:
**Head & Shoulders** Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo is the perfect solution to get rid of dandruff and worry. â­ Removes up to 100% of visible dandruff* with regular use. â­ Clinically proven formula with Piroctone Olamine, the active ingredient that fights the dandruff-causing fungus Malassezia globosa. â­ Controls flaking, scaling, and itching** associated with dandruff, starting from the first use. â­ pH balanced formula suitable for all hair types: normal, colored, and chemically treated. â­ Leaves your hair refreshed and silky smooth. â­ The world's #1 anti-dandruff shampoo, dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders**: â­ Use at least twice a week. â­ Gently massage into your scalp and rinse thoroughly. â­ Repeat if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Head & Shoulders**: â­Aqua, Ammonium Laureth Sulfate, Ammoium Lauryl Sulfate, Glycol Distearate, Cocamide MEA, Ammonium Xylenesulfonate, Selenium Sulfide, Sodium Citrate, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Parfum, Cetyl Alcohol, CitricAcid, SodiumChloride, Menthol, Sodium Benzoate, Stearyl Alcohol, Disodium EDTA, Limonene, Hydrogen Peroxide, Linalool, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Citronellol, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, DMDM Hydantoin, Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone

description_en:
**Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Shampoo 390ml**, get rid of dandruff and stay worry-free with **Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky**. This anti-dandruff shampoo removes up to 100% of visible dandruff*. Its clinically proven formula contains Piroctone Olamine, the active ingredient that fights Malassezia globose, the dandruff-causing microbe. This powerful shampoo controls flaking, scaling, and itching associated with dandruff and starts working from the first use.  Even better, this pH-balanced shampoo intensely moisturizes dry and frizzy hair for up to 24 hours, leaving it softer and silkier from root to tip. **Head & Shoulders** shampoo suits all hair types: normal, colored, and chemically treated hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Shampoo 390ml**
â­ Use at least twice a week for best results.
â­ Use every time you shampoo for maximum dandruff control.
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Gently massage into your scalp and work through to the ends of your hair.
â­ Rinse and repeat if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Shampoo 390ml**
â­ Piroctone Olamine
â­ Moisturizing ingredients
â­ Gentle cleansers

#HeadAndShoulders #Shampoo #HairCare #Dandruff #SoftHair #SilkyHair #Beauty #NaturalIngredients #HealthyHair #SaudiArabia

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders Shampoo For Severe Oily Scalp**: â­ Wet your hair. â­ Apply an adequate amount of **Head & Shoulders Shampoo For Severe Oily Scalp** to your hair. â­ Gently massage your scalp. â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water. â­ Repeat as needed.

description_en:
**Head & Shoulders** Citrus Fresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo is your solution for dandruff-free confidence. This powerful shampoo removes up to 100% of visible dandruff*. Its clinically proven formula contains Piroctone Olamine, the active ingredient that fights the dandruff-causing microbe (Malassezia globosa). It controls flaking, scaling, and itching associated with dandruff, working from the first use. Infused with lemon and citrus essence, this pH-balanced shampoo is perfect for oily hair, purifying the scalp to remove grease, oil, and dandruff flakes, leaving your hair smelling fresh and citrusy. **Head & Shoulders** shampoo suits all hair types. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders**: 
â­ Use at least twice a week. 
â­ Gently massage into your scalp. 
â­ Rinse thoroughly. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Head & Shoulders**: 
â­ Aqua, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycol Distearate, Zinc Carbonate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Xylenesulfonate, Zinc Pyrithione, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Parfum, Dimethicone, Menthol, Sodium Benzoate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Hydrochloric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Magnesium Carbonate Hydroxide, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citrus Limon Fruit Extract, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Magnesium Nitrate, Amyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Sodium Polynaphthalenesulfonate, CI 19140, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Methylisothiazolinone, CI 42090. 

#HeadandShoulders #Shampoo #AntiDandruff #Hair #Beauty #HairCare #Lemon #Fresh #HealthyHair #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Head & Shoulders Charcoal Detox Shampoo** gets rid of dandruff and worry. This shampoo removes up to 100% of visible dandruff* with regular use. Its clinically proven formula contains Piroctone Olamine, the active ingredient that fights the dandruff-causing microbe (Malassezia globosa). It controls flaking, scaling, and itching** associated with dandruff, starting from the first use. It deep cleans your scalp, removes toxins, and provides instant itch relief (associated with dandruff). pH balanced, suitable for all hair types: normal, colored, and chemically treated. The world's #1 anti-dandruff shampoo, dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders Charcoal Detox Shampoo**: 
â­ Use at least twice a week for best results.
â­ Use every time you shampoo for maximum dandruff control.
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Gently massage into your scalp and work through to the ends of your hair.
â­ Rinse thoroughly, and repeat if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Head & Shoulders Charcoal Detox Shampoo**: 
â­ Piroctone Olamine (active ingredient)
â­ Other ingredients to clean and condition hair.

description_en:
**Head & Shoulders Citrus Fresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo, 400 ml** â€“ Get rid of dandruff and stay worry-free with **Head & Shoulders** Citrus Fresh. This anti-dandruff shampoo removes up to 100% of visible dandruff* with regular use. Its clinically proven formula contains Piroctone Olamine, the active ingredient that fights the dandruff-causing microbe (Malassezia globosa). This powerful shampoo controls flaking, scaling, and itching** associated with dandruff and starts working from the first use. Infused with lemon and citrus essence, and pH balanced, itâ€™s perfect for oily hair, purifying the scalp to remove grease, oil, and dandruff flakes, leaving your hair smelling fresh and citrusy. **Head & Shoulders** shampoo suits all hair types: normal, colored, and chemically treated hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders**:
â­ Use at least twice a week.
â­ For maximum dandruff control, use every time you shampoo.
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Gently massage into your scalp and work through to the ends of your hair.
â­ Rinse thoroughly and repeat if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Head & Shoulders**:
â­Aqua, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycol Distearate, Zinc Carbonate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Xylenesulfonate, Zinc Pyrithione, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Parfum, Dimethicone, Menthol, Sodium Benzoate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Hydrochloric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Magnesium Carbonate Hydroxide, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citrus Limon Fruit Extract, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Magnesium Nitrate, Amyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Sodium Polynaphthalenesulfonate, CI 19140, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Methylisothiazolinone, CI 42090.

#HeadAndShoulders #Shampoo #AntiDandruff #HealthyHair #Beauty #HairCare #Lemon #Freshness #Scalp #HairHealth

**Head & Shoulders Shampoo, Oxygenated Charcoal Detox, 400 ml** â€“ stay 100% dandruff-free* with **Head & Shoulders Anti-Dandruff Shampoo**, the worldâ€™s No.1 shampoo* that is dermatologically tested. Its rich-lathering formula with Oxygenated Charcoal provides deep cleansing and unclogs pores from oil and dandruff build-up. With Piroctone Olamine as its active ingredient, it delivers clinically proven protection against dandruff-causing microbes. It controls dandruff, flaking, itching, and irritation, with visible results from the first wash.  It deeply cleanses your scalp, removing dandruff and impurities for instant itch relief. Suitable for all hair types: normal, colored, chemically treated.

description_en:
**Head & Shoulders 2in1 Menthol Refresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo & Conditioner, 900 ml** is your solution for dandruff-free confidence. This 2-in-1 anti-dandruff shampoo and conditioner removes up to 100% of visible dandruff* with regular use.  Its clinically proven formula contains Piroctone Olamine, the active ingredient that fights Malassezia globosa, the microbe that causes dandruff. This powerful shampoo and conditioner controls flaking, scaling, and itching** associated with dandruff, starting from the first use. Formulated with natural menthol, it provides a refreshing cooling sensation, revitalizes your hair and scalp, all while retaining its dandruff-fighting power. Suitable for all hair types: normal, colored, and chemically treated.  Experience total confidence with the worldâ€™s #1 anti-dandruff shampoo***, dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders 2in1 Menthol Refresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo & Conditioner, 900 ml**
â­ Use at least twice a week for best results.
â­ Use every time you shampoo for maximum dandruff control.
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Gently massage into your scalp and through to the ends of your hair.
â­ Rinse and repeat if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Head & Shoulders 2in1 Menthol Refresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo & Conditioner, 900 ml**
â­ Piroctone Olamine
â­ Natural Menthol

*Visible dandruff with regular use
**Itching associated with dandruff
***P&G calculations are based on Nielsen sales data July 2020 â€“ June 2021

description_en:
**Head & Shoulders Apple Fresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo** is your solution for dandruff-free confidence. This anti-dandruff shampoo removes up to 100% of visible dandruff* with regular use. Its clinically proven formula contains Piroctone Olamine, the active ingredient that fights the dandruff-causing microbe (Malassezia globosa). This powerful shampoo controls flaking, scaling, and itching** associated with dandruff and shows results from the first use. It leaves your hair with a long-lasting fresh scent and a balanced pH level, suitable for all hair types. Use **Head & Shoulders Apple Fresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo**, the world's #1 anti-dandruff shampoo dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders Apple Fresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo**:
â­ Use at least twice a week for best results.
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Gently massage into your scalp and hair.
â­ Rinse thoroughly and repeat if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Head & Shoulders Apple Fresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycol Distearate, Zinc Carbonate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Xylenesulfonate, Zinc Pyrithione, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Dimethicone, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Hydrochloric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Magnesium Carbonate Hydroxide, Hexyl Cinnamal, Magnesium Nitrate, Sodium Polynaphthalenesulfonate, CI 19140, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, CI 42090, Methylisothiazolinone.

*Visible Dandruff
**Itching associated with dandruff

description_en:
**Head & Shoulders** Daily Clean Anti-Dandruff Shampoo gets rid of dandruff and worry. This anti-dandruff shampoo removes up to 100% of visible dandruff* with regular use. Its clinically proven formula contains Piroctone Olamine, the active ingredient that fights Malassezia globose, the dandruff-causing microbe. This powerful shampoo controls flaking, scaling, and itching** associated with dandruff and starts working from the first use.  The pH balanced shampoo suits all hair types: normal, colored, and chemically treated hair, leaving your hair feeling refreshed. Go out into the world with confidence using the worldâ€™s #1*** anti-dandruff shampoo dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders**: 
â­ Use at least twice a week.
â­ Use every time you shampoo for maximum dandruff control.
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Gently massage into your scalp and work through to the ends of your hair.
â­ Rinse thoroughly and repeat if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Head & Shoulders**: 
â­ Piroctone Olamine (active ingredient)
â­ Other ingredients to moisturize and smooth hair.

*Visible dandruff with regular use
**Itching associated with dandruff
***P&G calculations are based on Nielsen sales data July 2020 â€“ June 2021

**Head & Shoulders** Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo, 400 ml, is the ultimate solution to get rid of dandruff and achieve smooth, silky hair. â­ Removes up to 100% of visible dandruff. â­ Moisturizes dry and frizzy hair for up to 24 hours. â­ Clinically proven formula with Piroctone Olamine to fight the dandruff-causing microbe. â­ Suitable for all hair types. â­ Boosts your confidence. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders**: â­ Use at least twice a week. â­ Gently massage into your scalp. â­ Rinse thoroughly.

shortdescription_en: Get rid of dandruff with **Head & Shoulders** Shampoo! Smooth, silky hair for up to 24 hours.

title_en: **Head & Shoulders Total Care Anti-Dandruff Shampoo, 400 ml**
title_ar: **Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ù‡ÙŠØ¯ Ø¢Ù†Ø¯ Ø´ÙˆÙ„Ø¯Ø±Ø² Ø¶Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ù‚Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„Ø©ØŒ 400 Ù…Ù„**
description_en:
**Head & Shoulders Total Care Anti-Dandruff Shampoo, 400 ml** is your solution for dandruff-free confidence. This anti-dandruff shampoo removes up to 100% of visible dandruff* with regular use. Its clinically proven formula contains Piroctone Olamine, the active ingredient that fights Malassezia globose, the microbe that causes dandruff. This powerful shampoo controls flaking, scaling, and itching associated with dandruff, starting from the first use. The pH-balanced shampoo combines great cleaning properties with dandruff protection, leaving your hair moisturized and manageable.  Best of all, **Head & Shoulders** shampoo suits all hair types: normal, colored, and chemically treated. Experience ultimate confidence with the worldâ€™s #1 anti-dandruff shampoo***, dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders**:
â­ For best results, use at least twice a week.
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Gently massage into your scalp and hair.
â­ Rinse thoroughly, and repeat if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Head & Shoulders**:
â­ Piroctone Olamine (active ingredient).
â­ Other ingredients for cleansing and conditioning.

*Visible dandruff
**Itching associated with dandruff
***According to Procter & Gamble research.

description_en:
**Head & Shoulders Citrus Fresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo** is your solution for dandruff-free, healthy, and shiny hair. This powerful shampoo removes up to 100% of visible dandruff* with regular use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders Citrus Fresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo**:
â­ Use at least twice a week for best results.
â­ Gently massage into your scalp and hair.
â­ Rinse thoroughly and repeat if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Head & Shoulders Citrus Fresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycol Distearate, Zinc Carbonate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Xylenesulfonate, Zinc Pyrithione, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Parfum, Dimethicone, Menthol, Sodium Benzoate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Hydrochloric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Magnesium Carbonate Hydroxide, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citrus Limon Fruit Extract, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Magnesium Nitrate, Amyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Sodium Polynaphthalenesulfonate, CI 19140, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Methylisothiazolinone, CI 42090.

title_ar: **Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ ÙˆØ¨Ù„Ø³Ù… Ù‡ÙŠØ¯ Ø¢Ù†Ø¯ Ø´ÙˆÙ„Ø¯Ø±Ø² 2 ÙÙŠ 1 Ø¶Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ù‚Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø¹Ù†Ø§Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù†Ø¹Ø´ØŒ 540 Ù…Ù„**
description_en:
**Head & Shoulders 2in1 Menthol Refresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo & Conditioner, 540 ml** is your solution for dandruff-free confidence. This 2-in-1 shampoo and conditioner removes up to 100% of visible dandruff*. Its clinically proven formula contains Piroctone Olamine, the active ingredient that fights Malassezia globose, the dandruff-causing microbe. This powerful shampoo and conditioner controls flaking, scaling, and itching associated with dandruff, starting from the first use.  Formulated with natural menthol, it provides a cooling sensation to your itchy scalp, revitalizing and energizing your hair and scalp while maintaining its dandruff-fighting power. Suitable for all hair types: normal, colored, and chemically treated. Experience the worldâ€™s #1 dermatologist-tested anti-dandruff shampoo.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders 2in1 Menthol Refresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo & Conditioner, 540 ml**
â­ For best results, use at least twice a week.
â­ For maximum dandruff control, use every time you shampoo.
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Gently massage into your scalp and work through to the ends of your hair.
â­ Rinse thoroughly and repeat if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Head & Shoulders 2in1 Menthol Refresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo & Conditioner, 540 ml**
â­ Piroctone Olamine
â­ Natural Menthol

*Visible dandruff with regular use

description_en:
**Head & Shoulders Men Hairfall Defense Shampoo, 600 ml** eliminates dandruff and worry. This anti-dandruff shampoo removes up to 100% of visible dandruff*. Its clinically proven formula contains Piroctone Olamine to fight the dandruff-causing microbe. This powerful shampoo controls flaking, scaling, and itching associated with dandruff, starting from the first use. It protects against hairfall due to dandruff and breakage, leaving your hair feeling refreshed. Suitable for all hair types. The worldâ€™s #1 anti-dandruff shampoo, dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders**
â­ For best results, use at least twice a week.
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Gently massage into your scalp and hair.
â­ Rinse and repeat if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Head & Shoulders**
â­ Aqua, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycol Distearate, Zinc Carbonate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Xylenesulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Parfum, Dimethicone, Sodium Benzoate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Magnesium Carbonate Hydroxide, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, CI 19140, CI 42090.

**Head & Shoulders Men Hairfall Defense Shampoo, 400 ml** is your solution for dandruff and hair fall worries. This anti-dandruff shampoo removes up to 100% of visible dandruff*. â­ Its clinically proven formula contains Piroctone Olamine, the active ingredient that fights the dandruff-causing microbe (Malassezia globosa). â­ It controls flaking, scaling, and itching associated with dandruff from the first use. â­ It protects against hair fall due to dandruff and breakage, leaving your hair feeling refreshed. â­ Suitable for all hair types: normal, colored, and chemically treated. â­ The worldâ€™s #1 dermatologist-tested anti-dandruff shampoo.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders Men Hairfall Defense Shampoo, 400 ml**:

**Head & Shoulders** Dry Scalp Care Anti-Dandruff Shampoo is your solution for dandruff and dry scalp. â­Removes up to 100% of visible dandruff with regular use. â­Contains Piroctone Olamine, the active ingredient that fights the dandruff-causing microbe. â­Locks in 75% more moisture than a regular shampoo. â­Infused with moisturizing almond oil. â­Suitable for all hair types. â­Creamy texture and refreshing scent. â­Dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders**: 
â­Use at least twice a week. â­Shake well before use. â­Gently massage into your scalp and hair. â­Rinse thoroughly, and repeat if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Head & Shoulders**:

description_en:
**Head & Shoulders Shampoo Oud 400 Ml** eliminates dandruff and worry with **Head & Shoulders** Oud Collection. This anti-dandruff shampoo removes up to 100% of visible dandruff. Its clinically proven formula contains Piroctone Olamine, the active ingredient that fights Malassezia globose, the dandruff-causing microbe. This powerful shampoo controls flaking, scaling, and itching associated with dandruff and starts working from the first use. Inspired by the Oud fragrance, this shampoo gives you beautiful, aromatic, moisturized hair.  Its pH balanced formula suits all hair types: normal, colored, and chemically treated hair. Go out into the world with total confidence using the worldâ€™s #1 dermatologist-tested anti-dandruff shampoo.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders Shampoo Oud 400 Ml**
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply to wet hair.
â­ Lather and massage into a rich lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Repeat if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Head & Shoulders Shampoo Oud 400 Ml**
â­ Piroctone Olamine (active ingredient).
â­ Moisturizing ingredients.
â­ Fragrance (inspired by Oud).

**Head & Shoulders Sub-Zero Freshness Shampoo, 400 ml** - Get rid of dandruff and stay worry-free with **Head & Shoulders Sub-Zero Freshness**. This anti-dandruff shampoo removes up to 100% of visible dandruff. Its clinically proven formula contains Piroctone Olamine, the active ingredient that fights Malassezia globosa, the dandruff-causing microbe. This powerful shampoo controls flaking, scaling, and itching associated with dandruff, starting from the first use.  Its pH-balanced formula suits all hair types: normal, colored, and chemically treated hair, leaving your scalp with an intense -5Â°C cooling sensation.  Use the worldâ€™s #1 dermatologist-tested anti-dandruff shampoo and feel confident.

description_en:
**Head & Shoulders Daily Protect Shampoo 400ml** is the perfect solution to protect your hair from dandruff, germs, and bacteria.  Formulated with a clinically tested formula containing pyrithione zinc, it removes dandruff and protects your scalp with every use. **Head & Shoulders** 3 Action Formula cleanses, protects, and moisturizes your scalp and hair (with regular use), so you can stay up to 100% dandruff-free (visible dandruff, with daily use). **Head & Shoulders Daily Protect Shampoo 400ml** provides daily protection from germs and bacteria, with an effective anti-dandruff formula, for beautiful, healthy-looking, and up to 100% dandruff-free hair (visible dandruff, with daily use).

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Head & Shoulders Daily Protect Shampoo 400ml**:
â­ For best results, use at least twice a week.
â­ Can be used long-term for maximum dandruff control.
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Gently massage into your scalp and hair.
â­ Rinse and repeat if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Head & Shoulders Daily Protect Shampoo 400ml**:
â­ Pyrithione Zinc (active anti-dandruff ingredient)
â­ Moisturizing ingredients
â­ Cleansing ingredients

With a clinically tested formula containing pyrithione zinc, Daily Protect shampoo removes dandruff and protects your scalp from germs and bacteria with every use. **Head & Shoulders** shampoo's 3 Action Formula cleanses, protects and moisturizes your scalp and hair (with regular use), so you can stay up to 100% dandruff free (visible dandruff, with daily use).  **Head & Shoulders** provides protection from germs and bacteria combined with a tried and tested anti-dandruff active formula, keeping your hair beautiful, healthy looking and up to 100% dandruff free (visible dandruff, with daily use).

description_en:
**Herbal Essences Bio:Renew Shampoo, Argan Oil of Morocco, 400 ml** is a powerful blend of antioxidants that revitalizes your hair. It leaves your hair feeling soft, shiny, and frizz-free. Experience the refreshing scent of vanilla, citrus, and exotic spices. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences Bio:Renew Shampoo, Argan Oil of Morocco**: 
â­ Apply generously to wet hair. 
â­ Massage into a rich lather. 
â­ Rinse thoroughly. 
â­ Follow with Herbal Essences conditioner for optimal results. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences Bio:Renew Shampoo, Argan Oil of Morocco**: 
â­Water/Eau
â­Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­Glycol Distearate
â­Dimethicone
â­Fragrance/Parfum
â­Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil
â­Histidine
â­Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice
â­Ecklonia Radiata Extract
â­Sodium Citrate
â­Cocamide MEA
â­Sodium Xylenesulfonate
â­Citric Acid
â­Sodium Benzoate
â­Sodium Chloride
â­Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride
â­Tetrasodium EDTA
â­Polyquaternium-6
â­Methylchloroisothiazolinone
â­Methylisothiazolinone

description_en:
**Herbal Essences Potent Aloe Vera with Bamboo, 400 ml** is specially designed to strengthen weak hair and nourish dry hair, leaving it hydrated, with a silky-soft feel for better manageability, suppleness, and shine. The aloe vera used is hand-picked from a farm in Mexico, using sustainable farming practices. Natural ingredients are verified by botanists at the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences Potent Aloe Vera with Bamboo, 400 ml**: 
â­ Apply shampoo to wet hair, work into a lather, and rinse thoroughly.
â­ For best results, follow with Potent Aloe Vera + Bamboo conditioner.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences Potent Aloe Vera with Bamboo, 400 ml**: 
â­ Aloe Vera Extract
â­ Bamboo Extract
â­ Other Natural Ingredients

For best results, use with **Herbal Essences bio:renew** Blue Ginger Conditioner.

description_en:
**Herbal Essences Bio:Renew Arabica Coffee Fruit Shampoo, 400 ml** revitalizes and volumizes your hair, leaving it soft, shiny, and full of life.  Our unique Bio:Renew formula is noticeable from the first wash, enhancing your hair's density and leaving it with a refreshing fruity scent. Indulge in the delicious aroma of crushed berries, warm caramel latte, and lingering patchouli. For best results, use with Herbal Essences Bio:Renew Arabica Coffee Fruit Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences Bio:Renew Arabica Coffee Fruit Shampoo, 400 ml**: 
â­ Apply shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage into scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences Bio:Renew Arabica Coffee Fruit Shampoo, 400 ml**: 
â­ Water
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Citrate
â­ Sodium Xylene Sulfonate
â­ Fragrance

â­ Tocopherol Acetate

**Herbal Essences Bio:Renew Argan Oil of Morocco Conditioner 400 ml** deeply nourishes and hydrates your hair, leaving it soft, shiny, and manageable. Crafted with a blend of antioxidants, this unique conditioner cleanses and protects your hair from environmental damage, restoring its vitality and shine. Experience the luxurious scent of creamy vanilla, zesty citrus, and exotic spices. For best results, use with **Herbal Essences Bio:Renew Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences Bio:Renew Argan Oil of Morocco Conditioner**:
â­ Apply a generous amount of conditioner to wet hair.
â­ Distribute evenly from roots to ends.
â­ Gently massage into hair and leave for a few minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with cool water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences Bio:Renew Argan Oil of Morocco Conditioner**:
â­ Antioxidant blend
â­ Argan Oil of Morocco
â­ Aloe Vera Extract
â­ Sea Kelp

description_en:
**Herbal Essences Aloe & Avocado Oil Curl Hydrator Shampoo 400 ml** is a sulfate-free shampoo specially designed to gently cleanse, hydrate, and nourish curly hair. Itâ€™s enriched with Aloe Vera and Avocado Oil, potent sources of nutrients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences Aloe & Avocado Oil Curl Hydrator Shampoo 400 ml**:
â­ Wet your hair.
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of shampoo to your hands.
â­ Gently massage into your scalp and hair.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat if necessary.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences Aloe & Avocado Oil Curl Hydrator Shampoo 400 ml**:
â­ Aloe Vera Extract
â­ Avocado Oil
â­ Other botanical ingredients

**Product Features:**
â­ Deeply cleanses and hydrates curly hair.
â­ Enriched with natural, nourishing ingredients.
â­ Free of sulfates, parabens, and silicones.
â­ Certified by plant scientists at the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew.
â­ Suitable for color-treated hair.
â­ Gentle on the scalp.
â­ Recyclable bottle.
â­ Refreshing fragrance.

description_en:
**Herbal Essences Bio:Renew Hydrate Coconut Milk Shampoo, 400 ml** is crafted with an antioxidant fusion to purify and protect your hair, bringing it back to life.  Enjoy soft, smooth, and hydrated hair with every wash. Experience the refreshing scent of coconut, white florals, and vanilla. For best results, use with the matching **Herbal Essences** conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences Bio:Renew Hydrate Coconut Milk Shampoo, 400 ml**:
â­ Apply shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage into a lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences Bio:Renew Hydrate Coconut Milk Shampoo, 400 ml**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Xylenesulfonate, Sodium Chloride, Stearyl Alcohol, Parfum, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycol Distearate, Glycerin, Dimethiconol, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Dimethicone, Hexyl Cinnamal, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Tetrasodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Polyquaternium-6, Trihydroxystearin, Trideceth-10, Histidine, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Linalool, Propylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Magnesium Nitrate, Ecklonia Radiata Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Zea Mays Silk Extract, Orchis Mascula Flower Extract, Cocos Nucifera Fruit Extract, Alcohol Denat., Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Methylisothiazolinone

description_en:
**Herbal Essences Potent Aloe + Avocado Oil Conditioner, 400 ml** is a rich conditioner formulated with Aloe vera and Avocado Oil, specially designed to hydrate and soften dry curly hair. It contains 6x more Aloe vera than other bio:renew products and is free of harsh chemicals like sulfates, parabens, and colorants (except for carried-over additives).  Endorsed by plant experts at the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew, it has a refreshing scent blended with citrus, cedarwood, and tonka bean notes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences Potent Aloe + Avocado Oil Conditioner, 400 ml**: 
â­ Apply to wet hair from root to tip, avoiding the scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Use after Herbal Essences curly hair shampoo.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences Potent Aloe + Avocado Oil Conditioner, 400 ml**: 
â­Aqua
â­Cetyl Alcohol
â­Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine
â­Stearyl Alcohol
â­Glutamic Acid
â­Parfum
â­Bis-Aminopropyl Dimethicone
â­Benzyl Alcohol
â­Sodium Benzoate
â­Citric Acid
â­Disodium EDTA
â­Histidine
â­Limonene
â­Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice
â­Butylene Glycol
â­Persea Gratissima Oil
â­Ecklonia Radiata Extract
â­Alcohol Denat.

#HerbalEssences #HairConditioner #CurlyHair #HairHydration #AvocadoOil #HairCare #Beauty #AloeVera #NaturalProducts #SelfCare

description_en:
**Herbal Essences Organic White Strawberry & Sweet Mint Conditioner 400 ml** is a luxurious conditioner infused with the refreshing scents of white strawberry and sweet mint. It leaves your hair feeling soft, revitalized, and naturally radiant. Formulated with Herbal Essences' signature bio:renew blend, it cleanses and nourishes with every wash.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences Organic White Strawberry & Sweet Mint Conditioner 400 ml**:
â­ Apply the conditioner to your hair, starting from the ends and working your way up to the roots.
â­ Leave it on for a few minutes before rinsing thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences Organic White Strawberry & Sweet Mint Conditioner 400 ml**:
â­ Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Xylenesulfonate, Fragrance, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Tetrasodium EDTA, Linalool, Sodium Hydroxide, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Geraniol, Propylene Glycol, Hydroxycitronellal, Glycerin, Histidine, Butylene Glycol, Magnesium Nitrate, Sea Kelp Extract, Aloe Vera Leaf Juice, Niacinamide, Denatured Alcohol, Alpinia Galanga Extract,  Silverweed Extract, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Potassium Sorbate, Magnesium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Methylisothiazolinone.

description_en:
**Herbal Essences Aloe & Avocado Oil Curl Nourishment Mask 250 ml** is a rich mask formulated with Aloe vera and Avocado Oil, specially designed for curly hair. It deeply moisturizes and nourishes your hair, protecting it from breakage and hair fall. Its unique formula is free of harsh chemicals and is endorsed by plant experts at the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences Aloe & Avocado Oil Curl Nourishment Mask 250 ml**:
â­ As a conditioner: Apply to wet hair from root to tip and rinse.
â­ As a mask: Apply to wet hair and leave for 3 minutes, then rinse.
â­ For best results, use with Herbal Essences shampoo and conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences Aloe & Avocado Oil Curl Nourishment Mask 250 ml**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Cetyl Alcohol
â­ Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine
â­ Stearyl Alcohol
â­ Bis-Aminopropyl Dimethicone
â­ Glutamic Acid
â­ Parfum
â­ Benzyl Alcohol
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ Histidine
â­ Limonene
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice
â­ Butylene Glycol
â­ Persea Gratissima Oil
â­ Ecklonia Radiata Extract
â­ Alcohol Denat.

description_en:
**Herbal Essences Aloe and Avocado Oil Leave-In Conditioner 180 ml** nourishes and softens your hair with its unique blend of aloe vera and avocado oil. This conditioner is carefully crafted with certified natural ingredients endorsed by plant experts at the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences Aloe and Avocado Oil Leave-In Conditioner 180 ml**: 
â­ Rub the cream between your palms.
â­ Spread evenly throughout your hair.
â­ Style using your fingertips to define curls.
â­ Use on damp or dry hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences Aloe and Avocado Oil Leave-In Conditioner 180 ml**:
â­ Certified Aloe Vera extract.
â­ Avocado oil.
â­ Other natural ingredients.

**Herbal Essences Aloe and Avocado Oil Leave-In Conditioner 180 ml** boasts a refreshing scent of citrus and water flowers. It's free of parabens, sulfates, silicones, and colorants, and safe for color-treated hair. Enjoy strong, healthy, and shiny hair!

description_en:
**Herbal Essences Water Blue Ginger Conditioner 400 ml** is a luxurious conditioner with amazing properties. â­ Unique formula combines antioxidants to purify and protect hair from damaging elements. â­ Leaves hair soft and vibrant with every wash. â­ Indulge in the refreshing scent of ginger blossom, floral bouquets, and clean musk. â­ Free from colorants and parabens. â­ pH balanced and safe for color-treated hair. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences Water Blue Ginger Conditioner 400 ml**: 
â­ Apply conditioner to hair from tips to roots. â­ Leave in for a few minutes then rinse thoroughly. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences Water Blue Ginger Conditioner 400 ml**: 
â­Water, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Stearyl Alcohol, Quaternium-18, Bis-Aminopropyl Dimethicone, Fragrance, Benzyl Alcohol, Hydroxypropyl Guar, Ceteryl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Citric Acid, Polysorbate 60, Tetrasodium EDTA, Linalool, Histidine, Propylene Glycol, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Glycerin, Oleyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Magnesium Nitrate, Sea Kelp Extract, Aloe Vera Leaf Juice, Niacinamide, Denatured Alcohol, Alpinia Galanga Extract,  Pimpinella Anisum Extract, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Magnesium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Methylisothiazolinone. 

#HerbalEssences #HairConditioner #BlueGinger #MicellarWater #HairCare #Beauty #Hair #HairProducts #KSA #YourBeauty

**Herbal Essences Bio:Renew Conditioner with Golden Moringa Oil, 400 ml** is a luxurious conditioner that nourishes and revitalizes your hair. â­ Crafted with a blend of antioxidants. â­ Purifies and protects hair from damage. â­ Restores life to dull and lifeless hair. â­ Leaves hair soft, shiny, and manageable. â­ Infused with a refreshing scent of citrus, white florals, and coconut water. â­ Suitable for all hair types, including color-treated hair. â­ Safe and pH-balanced formula. â­ For best results, use with **Herbal Essences Bio:Renew** Golden Moringa Oil Shampoo.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences Bio:Renew Conditioner with Golden Moringa Oil, 400 ml**: â­ Apply to wet hair from roots to ends. â­ Leave in for a few minutes. â­ Rinse thoroughly with water. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences Bio:Renew Conditioner with Golden Moringa Oil, 400 ml**: â­ Aloe Vera. â­ Sea Kelp. â­ Golden Moringa Oil. â­ Other natural ingredients.

**Herbal Essences** Moroccan Argan Oil Leave-In Conditioner, a rich formula combining the nourishing and restorative benefits of argan oil and antioxidants. â­ 10X LESS HAIR FALL*: Compared to non-conditioning shampoo. â­ Nourishes and detangles hair. â­ Natural botanicals endorsed by plant experts. â­ Real scent experience. â­ 0% Toxins: Free of parabens, sulfates, silicones, and colorants. â­ Cruelty-free. â­ Natural hair care routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences** Moroccan Argan Oil Leave-In Conditioner:
â­ Rub the cream between palms, spread throughout your hair, and style using fingertips. â­ Use on damp or dry hair. â­ Alternatively, use it as a pre-wash rinse-off treatment.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences** Moroccan Argan Oil Leave-In Conditioner:
â­ Moroccan Argan Oil. â­ Certified natural botanicals. â­ Free of parabens, sulfates, silicones, and colorants.

**Herbal Essences Potent Aloe Vera With Mango Shampoo, 400 ml** is a sulfate-free shampoo crafted with real Aloe Vera and Mango to help protect your hair color, leaving it beautifully hydrated and shiny. â­Revitalizes weak hair, moisturizes dry hair, and tames frizzy hair. â­Made with real Aloe Vera hand-picked from Mexico, authenticated by botanists at the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew. â­Packed with polysaccharides, moisturizes hair and soothes scalp. â­Color protect & shine. â­Rich in Aloe, 0% toxins. â­Real botanicals endorsed by experts. â­Recyclable & cruelty-free. â­Safe for daily use. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences Potent Aloe Vera With Mango Shampoo, 400 ml**: â­Massage shampoo into wet hair, lather, then rinse. â­Use with Aloe Vera + Mango conditioner for best results. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences Potent Aloe Vera With Mango Shampoo, 400 ml**: â­Real Aloe Vera, â­Mango, â­Other natural ingredients.

**Herbal Essences** Coconut Milk Leave-In Conditioner, a rich formula infused with coconut milk to nourish, hydrate, and detangle your hair leaving it soft and manageable. Experience 72 hours of frizz control* with this amazing conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences** Coconut Milk Leave-In Conditioner:
â­ Rub the cream between your palms.
â­ Distribute evenly throughout your hair.
â­ Style using your fingertips.
â­ Use on damp or dry hair.
â­ Can be used as a pre-wash treatment, followed by rinsing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences** Coconut Milk Leave-In Conditioner:
â­ Coconut Milk.
â­ Certified natural botanicals.
â­ Antioxidant formula.
â­ Free of parabens, sulfates, silicones, and colorants.
â­ pH balanced and safe for color-treated hair.

description_en:
**Herbal Essences Argan Oil And Aloe Vera Hair Oil Blend, 100 ml** restores your damaged hair to its natural beauty. â­ Moisturizes dry hair. â­ Detangles curly hair. â­ Tames frizzy hair. â­ Returns natural shine. â­ Makes hair easy to style. â­ 100% natural botanical ingredients. â­ Sustainably sourced aloe vera. â­ Rich in vitamins and antioxidants. â­ Endorsed by plant experts at the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew. â­ Free of parabens, silicones, and colorants. â­ Recyclable. â­ Cruelty-free. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences Argan Oil And Aloe Vera Hair Oil Blend, 100 ml**: â­ Shake well. â­ Spray onto damp or dry hair. â­ Do not rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences Argan Oil And Aloe Vera Hair Oil Blend, 100 ml**: â­ Water, Isodecanes, Isopropyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol, Histidine, Citric Acid, Fragrance, Cetrimonium Chloride, Polyquaternium-6, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Polysorbate 20, PEG-20 Glyceryl Laurate, Butylene Glycol, Benzyl Benzoate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Tocopherol, Linoleic Acid, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Coumarin, Alcohol Denat., Limonene, Retinyl Palmitate, Laminaria Digitata Extract.

description_en:
**Herbal Essences, Potent Aloe Vera With Mango Conditioner, 400 ml** is a natural conditioner rich in real Aloe Vera and Mango, designed to protect your hair color and give it shine and smoothness. Its sulfate-free formula moisturizes dry hair and makes it easier to detangle and style, without stripping it of its natural oils. Aloe Vera is sustainably sourced from a farm in Mexico using a patented extraction process, which increases the level of polysaccharides in the product. **Herbal Essences** collaborates with botanical experts at the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew in London to ensure ingredient quality.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences, Potent Aloe Vera With Mango Conditioner, 400 ml**:
â­ Apply conditioner generously to wet hair from roots to tips.
â­ Leave on for a few minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences, Potent Aloe Vera With Mango Conditioner, 400 ml**:
â­ Real Aloe Vera.
â­ Natural Mango.
â­ Sulfate-free formula.

description_en:
**Herbal Essences Coconut And Aloe Vera Hair Oil Blend, 100 ml** is a dual-phase light mist spray that deeply hydrates and nourishes dry hair or helps detangle curly hair, making it smooth and easily manageable. This natural hair oil has a lightweight feel, while its carefully selected ingredients will restore your hair to its natural beauty in no time.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences Coconut And Aloe Vera Hair Oil Blend, 100 ml**:
â­ Use as needed, on damp or dry hair.
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Don't rinse out.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences Coconut And Aloe Vera Hair Oil Blend, 100 ml**:
â­ Water, Isodecanes, Isopropyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol, Histidine, Citric Acid, Fragrance, Cetrimonium Chloride, Polyquaternium-6, Tocopherol Acetate, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Polysorbate 20, Hexyl Cinnamal, Propylene Glycol, PEG-20 Glyceryl Laurate, Butylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Linalool, Tocopherol, Linoleic Acid, Alcohol Denat., Corn Silk Extract, Orchis Mascula Flower Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Retinyl Palmitate.

**Herbal Essences Moroccan Shine Shampoo 400 ml** gives your hair a radiant shine and leaves it effortlessly manageable. This shampoo nourishes your hair from root to tip, leaving it irresistibly soft and shiny. Use with Herbal Essences Moroccan My Shine conditioner for best results.

â­ Argan Oil

description_en:
**Herbal Essences Shampoo Body Envy Fine To Normal Hair 400 ml** is a lightweight formula fused with passion flower sunrise and pearl, giving your hair incredible body and softness. This shampoo will leave your hair feeling refreshed, full of volume, and moving naturally. â­Boosts hair volume. â­Provides incredible softness. â­Lightweight and refreshing formula. â­Leaves hair feeling refreshed and free. â­Suitable for fine to normal hair. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences Shampoo Body Envy Fine To Normal Hair 400 ml**: 
â­Apply a suitable amount of shampoo to wet hair. â­Massage gently to create a rich lather. â­Rinse thoroughly with water. â­Use **Herbal Essences** conditioner for best results. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences Shampoo Body Envy Fine To Normal Hair 400 ml**: â­Aqua, â­Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, â­Sodium Laureth Sulfate, â­Cocamidopropyl Betaine, â­Glycol Distearate, â­Dimethicone, â­Sodium Citrate, â­Cocamide MEA, â­Sodium Xylenesulfonate, â­Parfum, â­Citric Acid, â­Sodium Benzoate, â­Sodium Chloride, â­Glycerin, â­Tetrasodium EDTA, â­Polyquaternium-6, â­Limonene, â­Hexyl Cinnamal, â­Linalool, â­Benzyl Salicylate, â­Propylene Glycol, â­Magnesium Nitrate, â­Mel, â­Prunus Armeniaca Fruit Extract, â­CI 19140, â­Methylchloroisothiazolinone, â­CI 17200, â­Magnesium Chloride, â­Phenoxyethanol, â­Methylisothiazolinone, â­CI 42090, â­Methylparaben, â­Butylparaben, â­Ethylparaben, â­Propylparaben.

description_en:
**Herbal Essences Shampoo Ignite My Color 700 ml** Unleash the vibrancy of your colored hair with this amazing shampoo! â­ Nourishes color-treated hair and reveals its full radiance. â­ Helps keep your hair healthy-looking and vibrantly colored. â­ Uplifting scent of Moroccan rose and passion fruit. â­ Use with Herbal Essences Ignite My Color conditioner for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences Shampoo Ignite My Color 700 ml**: 
â­ Lather shampoo into your hair. â­ Rinse thoroughly with water. â­ Follow with Herbal Essences Ignite My Color conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Herbal Essences Shampoo Ignite My Color 700 ml**: 
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Xylenesulfonate, Parfum, Cocamide MEA, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Linoleamidopropyl PG-Dimonium Chloride Phosphate, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Magnesium Nitrate, Zea Mays Silk Extract, Rosa Centifolia Flower Extract, Passiflora Incarnata Fruit Extract, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, CI 17200, Methylisothiazolinone, Tocopheryl Acetate, CI 19140, Potassium Sorbate.

**Herbal Essences Argan Oil Conditioner 400ml** unleashes the power of nature with every shower! Crafted with Argan Oil of Morocco, this conditioner cleanses and helps repair for smooth, beautiful hair, bringing it back to life. With 90% natural origin, it gives your hair the goodness of natural love. Its multi-layered scent will transport you to the warm sands of Morocco, from creamy vanilla to fizzy citrus and exotic spices. Use with Herbal Essences bio:renew Repair* Argan Oil of Morocco shampoo for even more beautiful hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Herbal Essences Argan Oil Conditioner 400ml**:
â­ Apply a suitable amount to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage from roots to ends.
â­ Leave for a few minutes before rinsing thoroughly.

â­ Argan Oil of Morocco
â­ 90% naturally derived botanical ingredients
